name: Camtasia Theme File
summary: A CAMTHEME file contains theme presets that modify the appearance of videos created by TechSmith Camtasia, a screen recording and video editing application. It stores settings that make up a theme, which include fonts, colors, and a logo. Camtasia users export and import CAMTHEME files to share and apply themes to videos to maintain a similar appearance.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
